description: Provides information about the status of the OpenTelemetry Collector

panels.description: OTel Collectors. Derived from the `otelcol.process.uptime` metric.

targets.expr: otelcol_process_uptime_seconds_total{deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name", k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name", host_name=~"$host_name", service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id", service_name=~"$service_name"}

sum(rate(otelcol_receiver_accepted_spans_total{deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",host_name=~"$host_name",service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",service_name=~"$service_name"}[$__rate_interval]))
+
sum(rate(otelcol_receiver_refused_spans_total{deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",host_name=~"$host_name",service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",service_name=~"$service_name"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.description: Aggregate ingestion rate across all receivers by telemetry type

targets.expr:
sum(rate(otelcol_receiver_accepted_log_records_total{deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",host_name=~"$host_name",service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",service_name=~"$service_name"}[$__rate_interval]))
+
sum(rate(otelcol_receiver_refused_log_records_total{deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",host_name=~"$host_name",service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",service_name=~"$service_name"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Logs

panels.description: Aggregate ingestion rate across all receivers by telemetry type

targets.expr:
sum(rate(otelcol_receiver_accepted_metric_points_total{deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",host_name=~"$host_name",service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",service_name=~"$service_name"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Metrics

panels.description: OTel Collectors. Derived from the `otelcol.process.uptime` metric.

targets.expr: otelcol_process_uptime_seconds_total{deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name", k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name", host_name=~"$host_name", service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id", service_name=~"$service_name"}

panels.description: CPU consumption rate of the OpenTelemetry collector process

targets.expr: rate(otelcol_process_cpu_seconds_total{deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",host_name=~"$host_name",service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",service_name=~"$service_name"}[$__rate_interval])

panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.title: Metrics

panels.description: Detailed breakdown by receiver and telemetry type

targets.expr:
sum by (signal_type_receiver) (
  label_join(
    label_replace(
      sum by (receiver) (
        rate(
          otelcol_receiver_accepted_spans_total{
            deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
            k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
            k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
            host_name=~"$host_name",
            service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
            service_name=~"$service_name"
          }[$__rate_interval]
        )
        +
        rate(
          otelcol_receiver_refused_spans_total{
            deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
            k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
            k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
            host_name=~"$host_name",
            service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
            service_name=~"$service_name"
          }[$__rate_interval]
        )
      ),
      "signal_type",
      "traces",
      "",
      ""
    )
    or
    label_replace(
      sum by (receiver) (
        rate(
          otelcol_receiver_accepted_log_records_total{
            deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
            k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
            k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
            host_name=~"$host_name",
            service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
            service_name=~"$service_name"
          }[$__rate_interval]
        )
        +
        rate(
          otelcol_receiver_refused_log_records_total{
            deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
            k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
            k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
            host_name=~"$host_name",
            service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
            service_name=~"$service_name"
          }[$__rate_interval]
        )
      ),
      "signal_type",
      "logs",
      "",
      ""
    )
    or
    label_replace(
      sum by (receiver) (
        rate(
          otelcol_receiver_accepted_metric_points_total{
            deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
            k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
            k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
            host_name=~"$host_name",
            service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
            service_name=~"$service_name"
          }[$__rate_interval]
        )
        +
        rate(
          otelcol_receiver_refused_metric_points_total{
            deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
            k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
            k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
            host_name=~"$host_name",
            service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
            service_name=~"$service_name"
          }[$__rate_interval]
        )
      ),
      "signal_type",
      "metrics",
      "",
      ""
    )
    ,
    "signal_type_receiver",
    "-",
    "signal_type",
    "receiver"
  )
)

sum by (signal_type_receiver) (
  label_join(
    label_replace(
      sum by (receiver) (
        rate(
          otelcol_receiver_refused_spans_total{
            deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
            k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
            k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
            host_name=~"$host_name",
            service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
            service_name=~"$service_name"
          }[$__rate_interval]

    label_replace(
      sum by (receiver) (

            k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",

      "signal_type",

    "signal_type_receiver",

    "signal_type",

sum by (signal_type_receiver) (
  label_join(
    label_replace(
      sum by (receiver) (
        rate(
          otelcol_receiver_failed_spans_total{
            deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
            k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
            k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
            host_name=~"$host_name",
            service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
            service_name=~"$service_name"
          }[$__rate_interval]
        )
      ),
      "signal_type",
      "traces",
      "",
      ""
    )
    or
    label_replace(
      sum by (receiver) (
        rate(
          otelcol_receiver_failed_log_records_total{
            deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
            k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
            k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
            host_name=~"$host_name",
            service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
            service_name=~"$service_name"
          }[$__rate_interval]
        )
      ),
      "signal_type",
      "logs",
      "",
      ""
    )
    or
    label_replace(
      sum by (receiver) (
        rate(
          otelcol_receiver_failed_metric_points_total{
            deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
            k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
            k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
            host_name=~"$host_name",
            service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
            service_name=~"$service_name"
          }[$__rate_interval]
        )
      ),
      "signal_type",
      "metrics",
      "",
      ""
    )
    ,
    "signal_type_receiver",
    "-",
    "signal_type",
    "receiver"
  )
)

sum by (signal_type_receiver) (
  label_join(
    label_replace(
      (
        sum by (receiver) (
          rate(
            otelcol_receiver_refused_spans_total{
              deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
              k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
              k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
              host_name=~"$host_name",
              service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
              service_name=~"$service_name"
            }[$__rate_interval]
          )
          +
          rate(
            otelcol_receiver_failed_spans_total{
              deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
              k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
              k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
              host_name=~"$host_name",
              service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
              service_name=~"$service_name"
            }[$__rate_interval]
          )
        )
        /
        sum by (receiver) (
          rate(
            otelcol_receiver_accepted_spans_total{
              deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
              k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
              k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
              host_name=~"$host_name",
              service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
              service_name=~"$service_name"
            }[$__rate_interval]
          )
          +
          rate(
            otelcol_receiver_refused_spans_total{
              deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
              k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
              k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
              host_name=~"$host_name",
              service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
              service_name=~"$service_name"
            }[$__rate_interval]
          )
          +
          rate(
            otelcol_receiver_failed_spans_total{
              deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
              k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
              k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
              host_name=~"$host_name",
              service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
              service_name=~"$service_name"
            }[$__rate_interval]
          )
        )
      ) * 100,
      "signal_type",
      "traces",
      "",
      ""
    )
    or
    label_replace(
      (
        sum by (receiver) (
          rate(
            otelcol_receiver_refused_log_records_total{
              deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
              k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
              k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
              host_name=~"$host_name",
              service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
              service_name=~"$service_name"
            }[$__rate_interval]
          )
          +
          rate(
            otelcol_receiver_failed_log_records_total{
              deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
              k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
              k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
              host_name=~"$host_name",
              service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
              service_name=~"$service_name"
            }[$__rate_interval]
          )
        )
        /
        sum by (receiver) (
          rate(
            otelcol_receiver_accepted_log_records_total{
              deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
              k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
              k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
              host_name=~"$host_name",
              service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
              service_name=~"$service_name"
            }[$__rate_interval]
          )
          +
          rate(
            otelcol_receiver_refused_log_records_total{
              deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
              k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
              k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
              host_name=~"$host_name",
              service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
              service_name=~"$service_name"
            }[$__rate_interval]
          )
          +
          rate(
            otelcol_receiver_failed_log_records_total{
              deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
              k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
              k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
              host_name=~"$host_name",
              service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
              service_name=~"$service_name"
            }[$__rate_interval]
          )
        )
      ) * 100,
      "signal_type",
      "logs",
      "",
      ""
    )
    or
    label_replace(
      (
        sum by (receiver) (
          rate(
            otelcol_receiver_refused_metric_points_total{
              deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
              k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
              k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
              host_name=~"$host_name",
              service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
              service_name=~"$service_name"
            }[$__rate_interval]
          )
          +
          rate(
            otelcol_receiver_failed_metric_points_total{
              deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
              k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
              k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
              host_name=~"$host_name",
              service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
              service_name=~"$service_name"
            }[$__rate_interval]
          )
        )
        /
        sum by (receiver) (
          rate(
            otelcol_receiver_accepted_metric_points_total{
              deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
              k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
              k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
              host_name=~"$host_name",
              service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
              service_name=~"$service_name"
            }[$__rate_interval]
          )
          +
          rate(
            otelcol_receiver_refused_metric_points_total{
              deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
              k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
              k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
              host_name=~"$host_name",
              service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
              service_name=~"$service_name"
            }[$__rate_interval]
          )
          +
          rate(
            otelcol_receiver_failed_metric_points_total{
              deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
              k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
              k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
              host_name=~"$host_name",
              service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
              service_name=~"$service_name"
            }[$__rate_interval]
          )
        )
      ) * 100,
      "signal_type",
      "metrics",
      "",
      ""
    )
    ,
    "signal_type_receiver",
    "-",
    "signal_type",
    "receiver"
  )
)

panels.title: Receivers

panels.description: Span processors inbound rate, aggregated across all processors
panels.title: Spans

panels.description: Logs processors inbound rate, aggregated across all processors
panels.title: Logs

panels.description: Metrics processors inbound rate, aggregated across all processors
panels.title: Metrics

targets.expr:
sum by (otel_signal_processor)(
  label_join(
    (
      sum by(processor, otel_signal) (
        rate(otelcol_processor_outgoing_items_total{
          deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
          k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
          k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
          host_name=~"$host_name",
          service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
          service_name=~"$service_name"
        }[$__rate_interval])
      )
      -
      sum by(processor, otel_signal) (
        rate(otelcol_processor_incoming_items_total{
          deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
          k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
          k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
          host_name=~"$host_name",
          service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
          service_name=~"$service_name"
        }[$__rate_interval])
      )
    )
    /
    sum by(processor, otel_signal) (
      rate(otelcol_processor_incoming_items_total{
          deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
          k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
          k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
          host_name=~"$host_name",
          service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
          service_name=~"$service_name"
      }[$__rate_interval])
    ),
    "otel_signal_processor",
    "-",
    "otel_signal",
    "processor"
  )
)

sum by (otel_signal_processor)(
  label_join(
    sum by(processor, otel_signal) (
      rate(otelcol_processor_incoming_items_total{
        deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
        k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
        k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
        host_name=~"$host_name",
        service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
        service_name=~"$service_name"
      }[$__rate_interval])
    ),
    "otel_signal_processor",
    "-",
    "otel_signal",
    "processor"
  )
)

sum by (otel_signal_processor)(
  label_join(
    sum by(processor, otel_signal) (
      rate(otelcol_processor_outgoing_items_total{
        deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
        k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
        k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
        host_name=~"$host_name",
        service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
        service_name=~"$service_name"
      }[$__rate_interval])
    ),
    "otel_signal_processor",
    "-",
    "otel_signal",
    "processor"
  )
)

panels.title: Metrics

panels.description: Detailed breakdown by exporter and telemetry type

targets.expr:
sum by (signal_type_exporter) (
  label_join(
    label_replace(
      sum by (exporter) (
        rate(
          otelcol_exporter_sent_spans_total{
            deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
            k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
            k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
            host_name=~"$host_name",
            service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
            service_name=~"$service_name"
          }[$__rate_interval]
        )
        +
        rate(
          otelcol_exporter_send_failed_spans_total{
            deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
            k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
            k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
            host_name=~"$host_name",
            service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
            service_name=~"$service_name"
          }[$__rate_interval]
        )
      ),
      "signal_type",
      "traces",
      "",
      ""
    )
    or
    label_replace(
      sum by (exporter) (
        rate(
          otelcol_exporter_sent_log_records_total{
            deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
            k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
            k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
            host_name=~"$host_name",
            service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
            service_name=~"$service_name"
          }[$__rate_interval]
        )
        +
        rate(
          otelcol_exporter_send_failed_log_records_total{
            deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
            k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
            k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
            host_name=~"$host_name",
            service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
            service_name=~"$service_name"
          }[$__rate_interval]
        )
      ),
      "signal_type",
      "logs",
      "",
      ""
    )
    or
    label_replace(
      sum by (exporter) (
        rate(
          otelcol_exporter_sent_metric_points_total{
            deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
            k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
            k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
            host_name=~"$host_name",
            service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
            service_name=~"$service_name"
          }[$__rate_interval]
        )
        +
        rate(
          otelcol_exporter_send_failed_metric_points_total{
            deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
            k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
            k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
            host_name=~"$host_name",
            service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
            service_name=~"$service_name"
          }[$__rate_interval]
        )
      ),
      "signal_type",
      "metrics",
      "",
      ""
    )
    ,
    "signal_type_exporter",
    "-",
    "signal_type",
    "exporter"
  )
)

sum by (signal_type_exporter) (
  label_join(
    label_replace(
      sum by (exporter) (
        rate(
          otelcol_exporter_send_failed_spans_total{
            deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
            k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
            k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
            host_name=~"$host_name",
            service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
            service_name=~"$service_name"
          }[$__rate_interval]
        )
      )
      /
      (
        sum by (exporter) (
          rate(
            otelcol_exporter_sent_spans_total{
              deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
              k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
              k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
              host_name=~"$host_name",
              service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
              service_name=~"$service_name"
            }[$__rate_interval]
          )
          +
          rate(
            otelcol_exporter_send_failed_spans_total{
              deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
              k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
              k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
              host_name=~"$host_name",
              service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
              service_name=~"$service_name"
            }[$__rate_interval]
          )
        )
      )
      * 100
      ,
      "signal_type",
      "traces",
      "",
      ""
    )
    or
    label_replace(
      sum by (exporter) (
        rate(
          otelcol_exporter_send_failed_log_records_total{
            deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
            k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
            k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
            host_name=~"$host_name",
            service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
            service_name=~"$service_name"
          }[$__rate_interval]
        )
      )
      /
      (
        sum by (exporter) (
          rate(
            otelcol_exporter_sent_log_records_total{
              deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
              k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
              k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
              host_name=~"$host_name",
              service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
              service_name=~"$service_name"
            }[$__rate_interval]
          )
          +
          rate(
            otelcol_exporter_send_failed_log_records_total{
              deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
              k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
              k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
              host_name=~"$host_name",
              service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
              service_name=~"$service_name"
            }[$__rate_interval]
          )
        )
      )
      * 100
      ,
      "signal_type",
      "logs",
      "",
      ""
    )
    or
    label_replace(
      sum by (exporter) (
        rate(
          otelcol_exporter_send_failed_metric_points_total{
            deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
            k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
            k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
            host_name=~"$host_name",
            service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
            service_name=~"$service_name"
          }[$__rate_interval]
        )
      )
      /
      (
        sum by (exporter) (
          rate(
            otelcol_exporter_sent_metric_points_total{
              deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
              k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
              k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
              host_name=~"$host_name",
              service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
              service_name=~"$service_name"
            }[$__rate_interval]
          )
          +
          rate(
            otelcol_exporter_send_failed_metric_points_total{
              deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
              k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
              k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
              host_name=~"$host_name",
              service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
              service_name=~"$service_name"
            }[$__rate_interval]
          )
        )
      )
      * 100
      ,
      "signal_type",
      "metrics",
      "",
      ""
    )
    ,
    "signal_type_exporter",
    "-",
    "signal_type",
    "exporter"
  )
)

sum by (signal_type_exporter) (
  label_join(
    sum by (exporter, data_type) (
      otelcol_exporter_queue_size{
        deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
        k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
        k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
        host_name=~"$host_name",
        service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
        service_name=~"$service_name"
      }
    )
    ,
    "signal_type_exporter",
    "-",
    "data_type",
    "exporter"
  )
)

sum by (signal_type_exporter) (
  label_join(
    sum by (exporter, data_type) (
      otelcol_exporter_queue_size{
        deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
        k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
        k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",
        host_name=~"$host_name",
        service_instance_id=~"$service_instance_id",
        service_name=~"$service_name"
      }
      /
      otelcol_exporter_queue_capacity{
        deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name",
        k8s_cluster_name=~"$k8s_cluster_name",
        k8s_node_name=~"$k8s_node_name",

    "signal_type_exporter",
    "-",
    "data_type",
    "exporter"
  )
)

panels.title: Exporters

panels.description: Logs from OpenTelemetry Collector filtered by dashboard variables

targets.query: search source=otel-logs-* | where resource.service.name="$service_name" | fields @timestamp, resource.service.name, resource.service.instance.id, resource.host.name, severity.text, body

panels.title: OpenTelemetry Collector Logs

list.description:
OpenTelemetry metrics. 
Send metrics using the Prometheus OTLP endpoint activating `keep_identifying_resource_attributes` and resource attribute promotion (aka `promote_resource_attributes`) including `service.name`, service.namespace`, `service.instance.id`, and `deployment.environment.name`
list.label: Metrics
list.name: prometheus_datasource

title: OpenTelemetry Collector
